page.title: 16HEALTH CARE IN BACK
page.content: {DOCTORS If you need a doctor's services you have to travel 7 miles to the Health Centre in Stornoway.The doctors from the Health Centre take it in turn to hold a weekly clinic.They make home visits when required. {NURSES Our area has one district nurse and two relief nurses.They visit the old and sick on doctor's orders. {DENTISTS There are no dentists in our area.You have to travel 7 miles to Stornoway for treatment.Every 3 years a dentist takes a caravan to school and treats the children's teeth. {HOSPITAL There are no hospitals in our area so we have to go to Stornoway.For serious cases patients go to the mainland.
